text: U.S., allies target Islamic State with 23 air strikes in Iraq (Reuters) 6:34 PM Five Czechs, Lebanese driver are missing Lebanon, Czech foreign ministry says (Reuters) 5:05 PM Iranian president Rouhani says nuclear deal will lead to closer relations with neighbors (Reuters) 2:18 PM Meretz leader Galon calls for Knesset inquiry into deterioration of U.S.-Israel ties (Haaretz) 1:09 PM 240 injured in commercial train crash outside of Johannesburg (DPA) 12:32 PM Lapid calls for Investigative committee to look into diplomatic failure to thwart Iran deal (Haaretz 11:30 AM Saudi-backed Yemeni forces seize two military bases from Houthis (Reuters) 10:16 AM U.S. Secretary of Defense Ashton Carter to arrive in Israel on Sunday (Haaretz) 9:03 AM Pillot killed in small plane crash in southern Israel (Haaretz) 7:52 AM Khamenei: 'Iran won't negotiate with U.S. on world affairs, nuclear talks were exception' (Reuters) 6:31 AM More than 300 people injured in train crash in South Africa (AP) 4:33 AM Wildfire sweeps across California freeway, burns cars (AP) 11:02 PM Death toll in Iraq car bombing rises to 80 (Reuters) 9:47 PM Car bomb kills 21 celebrating end of Ramadan in Iraq (Reuters) 8:51 PM
